title: 4-Apartment Villa for sale - Calabria, Italy
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


For sale 4 luxury apartment villa plus garages. Total living area: 580 sqm. (6,200 sq. ft). Recently renovated in excellent condition, well finished with lot of parking and secure gate and garages including central air conditioning.

Excellent luxury villa apartment located in the prime area of Spilinga, Italy (Via Della Resistenza) 4 km from the historic centre of Tropea and historic Capo Vaticano in Calabria, Italy.  Click on the video link below to view this beautiful scenic seaside resort.

https://youtu.be/zKzT3CZHD2M

Vendesi nel centro di Spilinga (4km da Capo Vaticano 11km da Tropea Stabile con n° 4 appartamenti + garage Totale mq. 580
In ottime condizioni, con ben 7 bagni, appena ristrutturato, con spazio antistante, stabile recintato.

- Apartamento 1: 140 mq. (3 bedroom/2 bath/kitchen/living room/foyer)
- Apartamento 2: 157 mq. (3 bedroom/2 bath/kitchen/living room/balcony)
- Apartamento 3: 108 mq. (2 bedroom/2 bath/kitchen/living room/balcony) 
- Apartamento 4: 196 mq. (3 bedroom/2 bath/kitchen/living room/bonus room/covered veranda w/views)
- Garages lower: 69 mq. 

Price for building: $299,000 USD or best offer

For additional information or showings please contact Francesco at  show contact info
. I'm based in the US but have my property manager on site for showings.
